text: Ramaswamy Venkataraman (, 4 December 191027 January 2009)Vinay Kumar (28 January 2009) R. Venkataraman passes away. The Hindu was an Indian lawyer, activist and politician. He was the eighth President of India from 1987 to 1992. Venkataraman died on 27 January 2009, at a hospital in New Delhi from multiple organ failure caused by kidney disease at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Deaths from kidney disease Category:Presidents of India Category:Vice presidents of India
title: R. Venkataraman
